column4: need internet help with "the network connection has been disconnected" error and eth0 is showing TX carrier:XX errors
need internet help with "the network connection has been disconnected" error and eth0 is showing TX carrier:XX errors
any suggestions please???? need internet help with "the network connection has been disconnected" error and eth0 is showing TX carrier:XX errors
it is not a cable problem
any suggestions please???? need internet help with "the network connection has been disconnected" error and eth0 is showing TX carrier:XX errors
you are on a cable modem? with or without a router behind that?
did you power each down everything, and then power back up; cable modem first, then the router, then the PC
couple minutes inbetween each too
ah maybe not, i'll try restarting once more, i did it the other way e.g. powered down cable, router but had pc on, i'll go try it again
it's more about the order when you power back up
because the error message that pops up in a bubble did change after i restarted the modem and router
gotta do the pc last
at first it was saying it couldn't get an ip and then it said it was getting d/c from the network
I know -- I saw you posts :)
i'll let you know how it goes, ty for the help i might wait a bit though cause apparently i downloaded 8.10 last night and so i'm getting the 9.x right now
I'll be here
cheers
remember the correct power up order..OK?
ya :)
cable modem, router , PC
i got it to work, i think it was the restarting but if it wasn't, the restarting fixed it :) now to wait to download 9.x and reinstall, hahah, cheers mate, thanks again
very good my friend -- try Xchat for IRC
I told you it was all about the proper power up sequence :)
haha yeah, brings me back to the days of win98 when your ethernet falls out and you need to restart just to get internet again :P picky procedures but at least they always work :P
